content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure has 3 layers with a total of 6 blocks:
- Bottom layer: 4 blocks (2 yellow half-cylinders, 1 green cube, 1 blue cube)
- Middle layer: 1 yellow rectangular block
- Top layer: 1 red U-shaped block

## Spatial Relationships
- Bottom layer: The green and blue cubes are positioned side by side, with the two yellow half-cylinders positioned in front of them
- Middle layer: A yellow rectangular block is placed horizontally across the top of the green and blue cubes
- Top layer: A red U-shaped block sits on top of the yellow rectangular block

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:
- Index 6: Blue cube
- Index 7: Green cube
- Index 11: Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation)
- Index 3: Red U-shaped block
- Index 13: Yellow half-cylinder (left)
- Index 14: Yellow half-cylinder (right)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7
    Step2: Move block with index 6
    Step3: Move block with index 13
    Step4: Move block with index 14
    Step5: Move block with index 11
    Step6: Move block with index 3
}
```

The assembly proceeds from bottom to top, starting with the cubes in the back, then adding the half-cylinders in front, followed by the horizontal yellow block, and finishing with the red U-shaped piece on top.
